topic.title: I need a fake ID in RL looking for advice, thanks in advance
topic.body: I need an ID, specifically a drivers license. There are several options out there. Anyone have experience with getting them?

1565292753_1Hc87xHmLsZyaGTQYnx2UmQPKwE1E.body: I wasn't on 8Chan but because of the media circus around it, I learned about ZeroNet. I had to join. Free speech is vital to everything and everyone.

1565305639_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc3.body: Newcomer here. I don't like Bieber or do any of those things. I also have thick skin so you can't hurt me.

1565373995_1PLaPnEwcMKPkfSJxta8vHr7kXjN7.body:
> [torkrench](#comment_2_16yDTXBd1txmFZkNmZ2LWvLdcqbn39ZwfD): This question would be better on Dread. http://dreadditevelidot.onion/

I'll try it, thanks.
wejehteman2, That is the kind of help I was asking for, thanks.

I'm WAY over 18. 

It's to avoid criminals that I need it, but if this place is not the place for this then I apologize and will not continue.
